website_summaries.verdict: A good bet if you're having a tough time picking just one DUPLO set for a special child. Plenty of pieces, accessories, and a sturdy box to keep them in make this a great starter set.
pros: A decent number of blocks and a booklet of easy-to-follow designs encourage creative play
Hinged window pieces, car, LEGO figure, and a dog allow kids to build their own little house, giving it a universal appeal that most kids enjoy
Includes a handful of numbered blocks to help introduce counting skills
Solid storage box is a nice touch
cons: Some owners felt it could do with a larger baseplate and a few more pieces

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lego. I bought it for my friend's kid. And I think he will love it. I like the idea of mixing different blocks together so you can create your own house/world. I especially reccomend this set for lego beginners, because it literally has a little everything. I also uploaded a photo so you can have better idea. If you find it's helpful, please click "yes". Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Not many large building pieces
customer_reviews.text: We bought this 65-piece duplo box to add to our son's duplo collection so he'd be able to make bigger things. We were disappointed that probably half of the 65 pieces were not building blocks but other pieces (like windows, flowers, figures etc). It would be okay as a starter set, but isn't great if what you want is some basic pieces for building.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Great set, but not enough pieces by itself.
customer_reviews.text: This was my sons first lego set. It's a good set, a lot of good pieces, and the little dog is a plus. But I would get another set with this one. There isn't enough generic pieces, like little squares and the rectangles. The my first bricks set (  ) is a good one to buy with it. That's what we did, and later on we got a couple car sets. There is never enough platforms so we'll have to get more of those too.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not great - worth $20 in time it frees up for you
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2.5 yr old nephew who never put legos together. After a week or so of just watching me, he started to build on his own. Pros: *might keep your little one busy, at least $20 worth *lets kids learn how to put stuff together Cons: *can’t really build to many cool things simultaneously e.g. cant build a house and train since they both use the windows - what’s left in blocks doesn’t build anything cool *some of the pieces fit too loosely so things fall apart too easily
customer_reviews.author: Customer 4583029

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to 18 month old grandson. He absolutely loved them. I must admit I was surprised by how much he did like them. I think his favorite thing was after I'd put them all back in the container, he would promptly dump them all out. Could hardly ever keep them in their box! He loved stacking them and also loved the window feature once I assembled it for him. Was also fond of the little doggie in there and the man. He kept referrin to the man as "dada". It was funny. Very pleased with my purchase and my grandson as well! Mission accopmplished!
customer_reviews.author: Chris M. Trankle

customer_reviews.title: Terrific First Set!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect purchase for my youngster. Just the right amount of pieces for a "first set". This set did not come with a play mat - I had to order it separately. Love that it comes with wheels and a little dog! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: madeline audreyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for toddlers who like building!
customer_reviews.text: Legos are awesome! My toddler LOVES them! He loves building tall towers and lego cars. He enjoyed that this set had the 1, 2, and 3 number blocks, since we are learning number right now! I really like all the colors of the blocks, especially the pretty sky blue color! That's awesome that Lego is making blocks in all these new colors!
customer_reviews.author: camquatch

customer_reviews.title: This set is so cool! I love the storage box
customer_reviews.text: This set is so cool! I love the storage box. It's cute and holds a lot of duplo blocks so my son is able to keep all of his sets together easily. It is a great starter set. He is able to build lots of different things from the building blocks included so it keeps him busy for a good amount of time. It is one of the toys he keeps coming back to. Duplos are easy for him to take apart and put back together without help so it's great for both of us!
customer_reviews.author: Nadene Adams

customer_reviews.title: Kiddo loved these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandpa to have at his house. He watches my cousin's son and it takes a lot of his energy to entertain him. The little guy loved these and I'm hoping it's giving grandpa a much needed break. They are Lego - so you know they are well made. And the Duplo's don't have tiny parts so you can rest easy knowing that when your toddler puts them in their mouth - there are no small parts to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: jpc1973

customer_reviews.title: Encourage kids to be creative
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to introduce a nephew to the wonderful world of Legos and the Duplo All-In-One-Box-of-Fun fit the bill. The pieces are well built and fit easily in little hands (he is 3) and brightly colored. Encourages kids to be creative and practice eye-hand coordination. With 65 pieces there are plenty of pieces without being overwhelming. It is a toy you can feel comfortable letting kids play with without fear. Best part is that it comes in its own storage container so little ones can put away the pieces (or mini creations) into the box without it being all over the floor or table. Highly recommend this as a gift for any child up to the age of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Kids love, colour brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Kids love, colour brilliant. The box closes properly and all the blocks fit easily, even if it is not packed neatly. Just throw in and close the lid. Children age ranging from 1 year to 9 years plays with it. So far there are no breakage, and it is all boy children. I will recommend for any family. The best part is the packing up and storing. Easy to pack up and store away.
customer_reviews.author: Anneshah B.

customer_reviews.title: A most excellent toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is just starting to put the Duplo blocks together. This is a very nice assortment and the car piece and the windows that open and close seem to hold the most interest. He even likes the box. This is an excellent value with the number and types of pieces included. This stays at grandma's house and he heads straight for the box when he comes over.
customer_reviews.author: Creaky

customer_reviews.title: Great toys for my 2 years old son
customer_reviews.text: Great toys for my 2 years old son! He was playing the big building blocks before. This Lego blocks are good size for him, not too small or big.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian F.

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to replace some knock-off Duplos we were gifted and are so happy to have these!! Quality is great; they stick together, they pull apart, the little drawings are cute. My 1, 3, and 6 yr old children love playing with these and I love seeing what they create. I think this set specifically is a great mix of basic pieces but also great to have the wheels, windows, person, dog, etc. for more specific purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Becker

customer_reviews.title: great set, especially for a first set
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this even though at 19 months he mostly stacks stuff randomly. It's better than the larger collection of just blocks he has at home because this has a car, a dog, a man, window/doors and "flowers." He likes those pieces the most. It also has plenty of blocks for his age.
customer_reviews.author: book lover

customer_reviews.title: A good starting point! But lacking.
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't own any Duplo yet, this set is a good start, come with a human boy, a dog, a car base, windows, plants....etc. But can't help but feels lacking, so I ordered a third party produced base board, and another basic building set from Walmart to add to the collection, and that's when the magical building process happens everyday. But the combination is quite costly. Well they are sturdy enough to be abused by my 2 years old, so if all the sets gonna last year of everyday play than I am satisfy.
customer_reviews.author: Bloodycotton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Lego set.
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered on time and in perfect condition. My son has fallen in love with these, just like I did when I was a boy. Well rounded set of brick types, and it comes in a fairly sturdy bucket that my son loves to use as a helmet, so there's that. I kind of wished these buckets would stack on each other, but aside from that this is a perfect addition for a young child's toy chest.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Lego Duplos = Lots of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of Duplos that can be used by itself or can be used with other Duplo sets such as Town Fire Truck, to build on that set. The All-in-One-Box has a lot of small square pieces, other shaped pieces, a wheel base that can be used to make a train, a car, etc. Our 4-year-old grandson loves this set! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: This is a great DUPLO set that provides hours of play time and learning
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy with unending hours of playtime! The large size of the Duplo blocks are great for the younger children. The imagination of our grandchildren always surprises us. So not only are they learning but there's always lots of laughter as we play together. All the pieces are stored in the storage box it comes with. With colored DUPLO pieces which also have numbers on them makes this a perfect choice for any younger child. We've also added to this collection as we've purchased other Duplo sets.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: Great collection!
customer_reviews.text: My four and a half year old have such fun with this set! She creates different structures everyday! I believe this is such a great tool for fueling creativity in kids. I only wish it has a platform piece to build upon and some more rectangular blocks. Durable, fun but a bit pricey still worth it though.
customer_reviews.author: Aswathy Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!! My four year old loving playing with classic Legos and Duplos. These are a bit easier for him to build with. My seven year old enjoys building these with him too. The other sets are great, but these are my favorite since they use their imaginations to make all kinds of things!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: The Kids Play with It Daily.
customer_reviews.text: All my kids like to play with this set. The 9-year-old likes that there are people and dog with different shapes and colors of the LEGOs. The youngest likes to play with the window and the dog. It’s not quiet enough for the kids to share, so I had to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Wei

customer_reviews.title: Fun first set for kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: Just gave this to my 1.5 to nephew! He immediately started to build! The creative juices were flowing! He struggled a bit putting some of the pieces together, but he is at the beginning of the age bracket, so that is developmentally appropriate!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Tops for a Choo-Choo Lover
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is crazy about choo-choos so had to get this for him. He's just 2 so I put the choo-choo together for him and he's had hours of fun. He plays with the other parts adding and removing from the choo-choo and mixing with his other Duplo sets.
customer_reviews.author: PamKC

customer_reviews.title: For the grand kids
customer_reviews.text: Bougth this and another. the Lego Duplo creative play is a great distraction for the kids when they are over, very durable and kid friendly. Was re-introduced to LEGGO at a function we had at work, Thats what lead me to even venture to seek them out . Plan to purchase additional sysytems in the future different size blocks and all. Great toy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves these! He is only two but already loves to build things. He has more than a few Duplo sets and this just added to his collection! Easy for small hands to handle and great for teaching a child to use their imagination.
customer_reviews.author: M.K. 17

customer_reviews.title: Dang plastic blocks are expensive these days!
customer_reviews.text: barring the aforementioned gripe about the price of them, these blocks are perfect, our 2 and a half year old loves to play with them it's the sweetest thing when she comes and asks to play blocks with her. I really wish they were less expensive, but at least they last forever and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Justin G. Luttrell

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are happy!!! As expected and very fast delivery. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Farah

customer_reviews.title: Good kids starter kit, for self or as gift
customer_reviews.text: Enough pieces for tiddler to practice color and putting/ breaking apart Lego blocks. Pieces of this set fills half the box, gives room for additions. Box might not be super easy for toddler in the first try (part of learning)
customer_reviews.author: Mimimichili

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for a co-workers son and he is obsessed with them! Product was a described and came in a timely manner. He absolutely loves building with these and they are the perfect size for him, he is 4
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Quantity
customer_reviews.text: I thought this wpuld be a much bigger box of lego..yes i know how many peices it says, but i thought more can be done with 65 peices. There isn't much for my kids to do with this amount of peices, so they don't really play with it. I regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 2 year old. They are of great quality. Also they are called "duplo", they are not as big as I had expected. Still a big early for her to play with. Great value for the discounted price of $17.99.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Fun for hours
customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old is crazy about LEGO duplo. She can easily manipulate the blocks. It’s without a doubt her favorite toy and she goes to it daily. I just removed the flower pieces from the kit because I was afraid they may pose as a choking hazard. This is a great starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: LorraineTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good but if you just need more blocks you can do better for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and cute, but like everything with the Lego brand-name – expensive for what it comes with. I suggest looking at the generic Lego brand blocks. I recently just bought some of them and you get way more bang for your buck and they work the exact same and look the exact same. I won’t buy Lego brand if I can help it again.
customer_reviews.author: KeriLynn

customer_reviews.title: Here is what is in the box:
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift that hasn't been opened yet, so I will update later if needed, but I'm sure this will be great. I couldn't find the breakdown of exactly what the 65 pieces were before I ordered, but here it is as shown on the bottom of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love Lego
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love Lego, helps with hand eye coordination, imagination and can keep kids busy for hours. This set was a winner thanks to the plastic storage box. Bought another set that came in a carton box which is already totally destroyed. Wish all they storage containers were plastic!
customer_reviews.author: SNY531

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviewers that it's hard to really build much with this set since most pieces are pretty small. And a few of the pieces (e.g., flowers) look like they are small enough to be potential choking hazards. I put those pieces aside, but so far, my kids aren't terribly interested.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Container & Sturdy Legos
customer_reviews.text: My son just turned 3 and this was his gift from his Nana. It has a very nice container to keep them all collected and put away. They're very sturdy Legos and even work with the regular Lego baseplates. That's a plus for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great first set!
customer_reviews.text: Fun first set that you can be so creative with! I believe this was the set that started it all in our family. We are huge lego duplo fans and love to collect all the sets now. We were blown away with the quality of these blocks and especially loved the little puppy character.
customer_reviews.author: CKEMBLLR

customer_reviews.title: Building blocks.
customer_reviews.text: First LEGO set I got for my babies. They loved building and just putting blocks together to make anything. LEGO set is a good size easy to handles.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: This set is perfect for our baby boy
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for our baby boy. Our 10 month old started playing with this same set at a friends house and he played with it so much that we ended up ordering it for him. There are a lot of pieces in the set and it is a good price compared to some other lego sets. It comes with cars, people, windows, and a little dog to play with as well.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice starter set to gauge your child's interest. Can't get to ambitious. But the container it arrives in works great for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar G.

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO DUPLO Blocks
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for our 3 year old granddaughter for a Christmas gift. She loves them! These were recommended by a friend. I will recommend them, too. Good price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... grew up with Duplos and Legos and I still enjoy playing with them and introducing my daughter to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with Duplos and Legos and I still enjoy playing with them and introducing my daughter to the world of Legos. This set is great and I look forward to purchasing more sets to go with it. My favorite part is that this comes with a storage box.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats a classic toy
customer_reviews.text: My toddler received several gifts for Christmas, but this is the only toy she plays with every day. The pieces are big enough that they don’t present a choking hazard to younger siblings, and the expanded color palette offers more inspiration. It’s a blessing to watch her creativity in action and we will definitely buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bunker

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the little ones!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our son’s most favorite toy! He’s 2.5 years old and loves to build with these blocks. I highly recommend this LEGO set!
customer_reviews.author: LSF09

customer_reviews.title: Great expansion for existing sets
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set! Wish they were a little less expensive so that we could get more but still appreciate the creativity and quality in each set!
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality from lego
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly has described. The Lego bricks are excellent quality. The bricks snap easily and with enough force to hold together yet still light enough that my 1 year old is able to separate them.
customer_reviews.author: G. B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome First LEGO Set!
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised at well these keep my 17 month-old occupied. The dog, car, and person is the clear favorites In this set. Vibrant and great for motor development. Can’t go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Big reusable tote!  Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our almost 2-year-old daughter loves it. Lots of regular blocks for building stuff and the car base is nice. She's really into the little flower/plant pieces. She also has a Duplo train set that works well with this one. The big green tote to store everything is a huge score!
customer_reviews.author: Weston James Ulfig

customer_reviews.title: Great for visual skills
customer_reviews.text: Love that this came with visuals. I’m a Pediatric OT and it’s so nice to be able to show an image to my kids and have them match it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ludington

customer_reviews.title: Duplos--Enduring Classic Toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughters spend hours creating with Duplo blocks. I ordered this set for my grandson and will give them to him for his first birthday. Given how much he loves his wooden blocks I am sure he will enjoy these as well.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Duplo All in One Box Building Set.
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect for a two year old who is a first time lego/duplo player. Price was good, and shipping was super fast. Thank you very much. This Duplo building set was a perfect first time set for a toddler. Shipping was fast, price was good. thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Litt

customer_reviews.title: Bare feet approved
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who has more fun, the toddler or the spouse. Blocks are the perfect size for her little hands and also helps with colors. The fact that I could fit her backhoe set and airplane set in the box as well, was an added bonus. My toes approve of having a home for them.
customer_reviews.author: CRH

customer_reviews.title: Nice size collection of large lego blocks in a sturdy container for storage. Good price for Legos for pre-school age builders.
customer_reviews.text: A very usable, bright colored container with many large lego blocks for building which is very suitable for imaginative preschoolers and also as a basic collection for more advanced building sets. My 3 year old nephew loved it & spents hours builing his lego creations. I bought the set as a Birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these items for a library program. It has gone over very well. Good quality and stood the test of public use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great set for 2 year old. My son loves cars and trucks, and this set comes with a base for a car. He builds a new car invention every day. He previously had a set of mega blocks that had too many single node pieces, so he couldn't build much with them. This set is far better for creative building, well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: natblu522

customer_reviews.title: I love it, son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Love these little sets. I had a pink one for my daughter and had to get a green one for my son. Duplo LEGO’s are superior to any copycat. Can’t be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna C.

customer_reviews.title: This set has a good mix of bricks
customer_reviews.text: This set has a good mix of bricks. Some of the sets I feel have to many dolls or non-building pieces but this not one of those. It has plenty of building pieces mixed with a few of the favorite extras- car, person, window, dog etc but not too many of them. The Duplo size is perfect for my 2 yr old who is too frustrated with the regular Lego bricks that her older siblings play with. Gives her some of her own so she doesn't steal theirs.
customer_reviews.author: WM5R

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my granddaughter, She loves Legos. I thought the box was going to be a little bit bigger than what it actually is but she’s 2 almost 3 years old it also has little LEGO people with it and some other things so I guess it turned out to be pretty good for her.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra

customer_reviews.title: Its Legos.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the lid and base do not match up to lock in place. So it just slides off. But the legos are great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Duplo's for Little Kids
customer_reviews.text: This set is versatile, allowing a lot of creativity. I like that the pieces are larger and easy for little hands to maneuver. My kids had a lot of fun getting creative with these legos. They started at age 1, 3 and 4. We will be advancing in a few years to the "friends" sets, but right now I'm extremely happy with the Duplo sets.
customer_reviews.author: 4evrhpy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value Duplo set. I believe Duplos and Legos are the single best toy you can give to a child.
customer_reviews.author: mkultra

customer_reviews.title: Great “adventure” building
customer_reviews.text: Daughter passed hours playing with these 33 years ago and my grandson enjoying them just as much!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5yo son LOVES these. He builds and rebuilds for long stretches of time. It doesn't have very many blocks in the box and there is room for more, so I would suggest ordering another set of blocks. It's perfectly packaged and easy to store. My only complaint is that it's a tiny bit difficult for him to open the box by himself, but it's a minor issue in the grand scheme of things since he adores playing with them!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: A nice step between the big megablocks and small legos. We had a small set of these beforehand and those fit into the container too. Not a ton of room to spare in container with what is already coming with it but will hold another small set or two.
customer_reviews.author: Dae

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my toddler busy
customer_reviews.text: We have another set of Duplo, it’s good amount of pieces when combine two sets. My 2 years old loves it and keeps her busy quite a long time while I’m working.
customer_reviews.author: Spacetraveler

customer_reviews.title: Great for small motor skills, color recognition
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my 3 yr old granddaughter. She loves legos. Perfect for small hands. Nice set. Great to help with small motor skills and color recognition.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Duran

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: 2 year old loves to build things! Great size since he still likes to put everything in his mouth.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! It would be nice to have more pieces available but still very nice gift for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Katarzyna

customer_reviews.title: Always a good gift
customer_reviews.text: This is always a good gift for a little one. Durable, fun and promotes creativity. Also comes with fair amount of colorful bricks.
customer_reviews.author: Nim126

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nearly 2-year old and couldn't be more thrilled! It's a great starter set, with all the basic pieces (single and double bricks), as well as a few creative pieces (car, person, dog, 2 windows etc). I would definitely recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: B P Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: as usual legos are awesome. Bought these for my grandson whos 4. He will love them...
customer_reviews.author: RjVZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Legos, Terrible Container!
customer_reviews.text: Legos are always fun and my boys love playing with them...but they are boys and the plastic container they come in is very chintzy. It looks like the same container as what they used to come in, but it’s not. I was very disappointed in the quality. The Legos are great, no problem there, so when the container breaks I suppose I can put the Legos in another tote!
customer_reviews.author: Lizz VanTornhout

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I just couldn't believe my great nephews didnt own duplos yet!! Every child needs these as they grow up. They encourage exploration and invention.
customer_reviews.author: kerri walker

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great starter set but not enough pieces to build bigger and fancier structures. My daughter loves the set, now keeps asking me to buy more! 😅
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great product and Great box for storing!
customer_reviews.text: Box was a bit smaller than what I had imagined by looking at it online - but overall came with all the blocks as described and was the perfect addition to our current collection. Box is perfect for storage too!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this for a one year old and she loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a one year old and she loved it!! So did her 3 and 5 year old siblings. Awesome toy for getting the kids to play together. Only downside is with all the kids playing, they will need more blocks!
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: great starter set for toddler
customer_reviews.text: great starter set for toddle; size is perfect for their little hands. decent amount of pieces to start off. container holds all pieces and can probably hold another full set.
customer_reviews.author: maybreeze01

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Lego quality, good as always. kids can sit for looong time with pieces
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my  3 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these got it as a gift she enjoyed it and it’s her go to toy she loves building making different styles with legos ! Love how it won’t ever get boring so much to do with legos
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Always a Keeper
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with these blocks. Durable and keep the kids busy.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These boxes are a great value for contents, and usage of the box itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 3 yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Cute blocks my 3 yr old loves this product was a great birthday gift this year.
customer_reviews.author: Letticia

customer_reviews.title: LEGO DUPLO Creative Play 6059074 Educational Toy Review
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my two year old. The pieces are large which makes it easy for toddlers small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this LEGO toy a few years ago for my nephew. He likes it. Now I have my own kid and get him a set. He also likes it. So many ways to play. Good toy for kids.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: ... ready for the smaller Legos so the Duplos are perfect. Not too big
customer_reviews.text: I have a four year old son who isn't quite ready for the smaller Legos so the Duplos are perfect. Not too big, not too small, my vacuum doesn't eat them and it won't kill me if I step on a block. ;) Overall I have been pleased with every Duplo set we buy. My only complaint is the price. You don't get a lot for your money (compared to Legos), forcing you to buy multiple sets if your kid is an avid builder.
customer_reviews.author: TheBeehive

customer_reviews.title: These blocks are a great form 3 year old who is not interested in ...
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are a great form 3 year old who is not interested in the large building blocks and the classic small legos. For the price paid I would like to see more plan blocks to build with.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Great First Set
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler begs for our regular lego sets, so we decided he was ready for his own first set. We love these. He loves these. We will definitely be adding to his collection soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Hit buy now
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t love legos ? Just get this, you won’t be sorry
customer_reviews.author: Huck

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set for your little ones.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great little starter kit for my daughter. She's figured out how to stick the bricks together and loves the wheeled chassis the set came with... Sticking bricks on the wheeled part and zooming it around provides a lot of amusement to her. She's really developed hand-eye coordination and manipulation of the pieces during her 18 - 20 month time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Porter Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Great child-
customer_reviews.text: Guess it was OK. Was purchased for a relative's child and was give to them. We've been told that it has provided a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Beagleman

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Was able to buy these for under $20!

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Great way to add to the duplication bricks and keep the mess to a minimum
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter, she really enjoys playing and especially building up the little car in this set. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs more blocks and a greater variety of shapes if more than one child is playing.
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the two to four age group. Would have liked a bigger variety of shapes. Maybe a slightly larger set with more options. Especially if there are 2 children in the family of the right age for this.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: 18 month old loves
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my 18 month old and he loves it! He loves to play legos with his big brother.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Contains many pieces for the kids to use their imaginations and build. All pieces were included and case was excellent to store it all.
customer_reviews.author: Edith M. Dore'

customer_reviews.title: Fun - go for the bigger box, though
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old and 2-year-old have been playing with these every day. I should have gone ahead and sprang for the bigger box because the kids use these pieces up quickly playing together.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level lego
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level Lego for kids. My daughter is almost 2 and this is her first set of Lego. It became her favorite toy right away. It is easy for the small hands and the creative mind. I would highly recommend this set as the entry level for entering the amazing LEGO world.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

product_meta.title: LEGO DUPLO All-in-One-Box-of-Fun Building Kit 10572 Open Ended Toy for Imaginative Play with Large LEGO bricks made for toddlers and preschoolers (65 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Style:StandardThe LEGO DUPLO All-In-One Box of Fun set has a whole load of DUPLO bricks for fun building and rebuilding for creative play. At its heart is a buildable wagon base with rounded edges and wheels that really turn. This comprehensive building set also includes 2 opening window elements, a cute dog figure and numbered bricks with corresponding decorated bricks to help your child develop their counting skills. There are even extra classic DUPLO bricks for more creative fun. Includes a boy DUPLO figure. With this fun building kit, your toddler can use their imagination to create cars, houses, buildings, wagons, trains, and more.
feature_bullets: Let your toddler's imagination run wild with this colorful collection of LEGO DUPLO elements and building bricks in a handy storage case! Little kids from 18 months old to 5 years old can enjoy this creative toy.

This LEGO DUPLO creative box includes one DUPLO boy figure and one dog figure, windows that open, wheels that roll, and numbered and extra pieces which can be built into endless combinations of toy houses, cars, trains, trees, and so much more!

This fun toy offers endless hours of creative play to little kids, who will enjoy this set both individually and in group play. Toddlers will love using the colorful building bricks and their creativity to build and rebuild whatever they can imagine!

LEGO DUPLO brick building toys are compatible with all other LEGO DUPLO construction sets. These toys encourage creative building skills and imaginative play. Play sets contain large LEGOS which are designed to be safe and easy for little hands.

House measures over 5inches high, 4inches wide and 3inches deep. Wagon/car measures over 1inches high, 3inches long and 2inches wide. Dog figure stands over 1inches tall. Boy stands over 1inches tall. 65 pieces. This DUPLO LEGO set is designed for boys and girls between 1.5 and 5 years old.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
